statements: DELETE FROM building_material_prices WHERE material_name = 'Concrete' AND price < 50;
DELETE FROM MaterialTrends WHERE trend_id = 10 AND material_id = 5;
DELETE FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND price > 50.00;
DELETE FROM material_prices WHERE price > 1000 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM material_availability WHERE available_quantity < 50 AND last_updated < TIMESTAMP '2020-12-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM PriceHistory WHERE history_date < '2022-01-01' AND price < 50;
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE material_id IN (SELECT material_id FROM BuildingMaterials WHERE price > 100) AND supplier_id = 3;
